alert.note: Alert for Central Yampa River Basin (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 05 at 8:03AM MST until January 05 at 6:00PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts 45 to 50 mph expected. The recent snow pack and passing snow showers this afternoon will create areas of blowing snow and drifting snow. * WHERE...Central Yampa River Basin. * WHEN...From 8 AM to 6 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility, making travel very difficult at times. Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. Rapid changes in visibility and slick road conditions may lead to accidents. Reduce your speed and turn on headlights!
